results.title: The Mole and the matchbox
results.brief_description: In this animated story, the Mole comes upon a matchbox. The Mole and the Mouse then devise many amusing activities with the box and the matches, accidentally discovering the true purpose of matches. Without narration.
results.description: In this animated story, the Mole comes upon a matchbox. The Mole and the Mouse then devise many amusing activities with the box and the matches, accidentally discovering the true purpose of matches. Without narration.

results.title: The Mole and the lollipop
results.brief_description: Cleaning up the litter made by two candy-eating children, Mole finds a lollipop they left behind. Not knowing what it is, Mole demonstrates great inventiveness in trying to discover its purpose. An animated program without narration.
results.description: Cleaning up the litter made by two candy-eating children, Mole finds a lollipop they left behind. Not knowing what it is, Mole demonstrates great inventiveness in trying to discover its purpose. An animated program without narration.

results.title: The Mole and the hedgehog
results.brief_description: An animated film about a hedgehog who, despite warnings from a mole and a mouse is captured and taken to a school lab, where he will certainly be stuffed. Mole and Mouse devise an ingenious method to rescue their friend.
results.description: An animated film about a hedgehog who, despite warnings from a mole and a mouse is captured and taken to a school lab, where he will certainly be stuffed. Mole and Mouse devise an ingenious method to rescue their friend.

results.title: The Mole and the flying carpet
results.brief_description: An animated story about a mole who, finding a flying carpet in a rubbish bin, cleans the carpet and is rewarded by the carpet becoming his friend.

results.title: The Mole and the egg
results.brief_description: An animated children’s film about a mole who finds an abandoned hen’s egg and sets out to find the egg’s mother. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.

results.title: The Mole and the chewing gum
results.creator_credit: J. Forman, H. Mauricova, H. Kilianove, Kratky Film and Zdenek Miler
results.brief_description: An animated film about a mole who discovers some chewing gum and gets into a sticky situation. Story by J. A. Novotny. Music by Milos Vacek. Animated by J. Doubrava, O. Kudrnac, K. Stebl, V. Maresova, Z. Bartova and J. Vokoun.

results.creator_credit: J Sebestik, Kratky Film and Zdenek Miler
results.brief_description: An animated children’s film about a mole whose new camera is broken during a fight with his friend Mouse. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.

results.title: The Mole and the bulldozer
results.brief_description: An animated film about a mole tending his flowerbeds only to find surveyors stakes marking a projected road. When he sees a bulldozer approaching, the mole quickly devises a plan to outwit the bulldozer and save his garden.
results.description: An animated film about a mole tending his flowerbeds only to find surveyors stakes marking a projected road. When he sees a bulldozer approaching, the mole quickly devises a plan to outwit the bulldozer and save his garden.

results.title: The Mole and music (K)
results.brief_description: Mole is a music-lover. When he breaks a record that he is especially fond of, he does not just sit and mope, but with the help of Mouse sets out to make a new record from scratch. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.

results.title: The Mohammedan world: beginnings and growth
results.creator_credit: Coronet Instructional Films and John Smart
results.brief_description: Presents scenes of mosques and historic landmarks in cities which are a part of the Mohammedan world; life in Baghdad, Damascus, Cairo and Old Jerusalem; discusses Mohammedanism and traces its development; shows the contribution of Mohammedans to western culture in literature, agriculture, chemistry, mathematics and the industrial arts.
